## Filters.FacetsProps.children property

A function which renders the Facets UI with the provided facets data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
children?: (facets: DisplayableFacet[]) => ReactNode;
```

## Remarks

It is intended to be used with the Filters subcomponents including Filters.FilterGroup, Filters.CollapsibleLabel, Filters.SearchInput, Filters.CheckboxOption, Filters.CollapsibleSection
